title: Deals: AirTags hit best price of the year, latest Samsung Frame AirPlay 2 TVs $239 off, more
content:
All of today’s best deals are headlined by the chance to score a 4-pack of Apple AirTags at the lowest price of the year. That’s alongside the first discounts on Samsung 2022 Frame 4K QLED AirPlay 2 TVs and an iPad Air 4 clearance sale at $150 off. Hit the jump for all that and more in the latest 9to5Toys Lunch Break.

more…

The post Deals: AirTags hit best price of the year, latest Samsung Frame AirPlay 2 TVs $239 off, more appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Score the lowest price of the year on a 4-pack of Apple's AirTag item finders at $89, plus the first discounts on Samsung's 2022 Frame TVs.
